title: Business Owner (subclass 890) visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== ​This visa is closed to new applications. Business Owner (subclass 890) visa Page Content ​​​​​​​​​The Business Owner (subclass 890) visa closed to new applications on 22 March 2025.​ Visa holders Details This is a permanent visa, it lets you stay in Australia indefinitely. It allows you to travel to and from Australia for 5 years from the date we grant the visa. You can use Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) for free to check your visa details and entitlements. How long your visa lasts Details This visa lets you stay in Australia indefinitely. It allows you to travel to and from Australia as many times as you want for 5 years from the date we grant this visa. This is as long as the travel facility on this visa remains valid. Use VEVO to see when your travel facility ends. If you want to travel to Australia after the initial 5-year travel facility: you will need to apply for and be granted a Resident Return visa so that you can re-enter Australia as a permanent resident you may want to consider becoming an Australian citizen so you can re-enter Australia as an Australian citizen. If you become an Australian citizen, you don't require a visa to enter Australia. You will need to apply for an Australian passport and use it to leave and re-enter Australia. See more about eligibility requirements and current processing times for Australian citizenship What this visa lets you do Details This visa allows you and your dependent family members who also hold a subclass 890 visa to: stay in Australia permanently work and study in Australia carry out business activity in Australia enrol in Australia’s public health care scheme, Medicare sponsor your relatives to come to Australia travel to and from Australia for 5 years apply for Australian citizenship, if eligible. Your obligations Details You and your family members must meet all visa conditions and obey Australian laws. Tell us if things change Details Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include: changes to your phone number, email, address or passport changes to your relationship status the birth of a child. See how to let us know if there is a change in your situation If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.

# Business Owner (subclass 890) visa

Business Owner (subclass 890) visa
Page Content

​​​​​​​​​The Business Owner (subclass 890) visa closed to new applications on 22 March 2025.​

​​​​​​​​​The Business Owner (subclass 890) visa closed to new applications on 22 March 2025.​

## Visa holders

Visa holders
Details

This is a permanent visa, it lets you stay in Australia indefinitely. It allows you to travel to and from Australia for 5 years from the date we grant the visa.

This is a permanent visa, it lets you stay in Australia indefinitely. It allows you to travel to and from Australia for 5 years from the date we grant the visa.

You can useVisa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)for free to check your visa details and entitlements.

You can use
Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)
for free to check your visa details and entitlements.

### How long your visa lasts

How long your visa lasts
Details

This visa lets you stay in Australia indefinitely.

This visa lets you stay in Australia indefinitely.

It allows you to travel to and from Australia as many times as you want for 5 years from the date we grant this visa. This is as long as the travel facility on this visa remains valid. UseVEVOto see when your travel facility ends.

It allows you to travel to and from Australia as many times as you want for 5 years from the date we grant this visa. This is as long as the travel facility on this visa remains valid. Use
VEVO
to see when your travel facility ends.

If you want to travel to Australia after the initial 5-year travel facility:

If you want to travel to Australia after the initial 5-year travel facility:
- you will need to apply for and be granted aResident Return visaso that you can re-enter Australia as a permanent resident
you will need to apply for and be granted a
Resident Return visa
so that you can re-enter Australia as a permanent resident
- you may want to consider becoming an Australian citizen so you can re-enter Australia as an Australian citizen.
you may want to consider becoming an Australian citizen so you can re-enter Australia as an Australian citizen.

If you become an Australian citizen, you don't require a visa to enter Australia. You will need to apply for an Australian passport and use it to leave and re-enter Australia. See more about eligibility requirements and current processing times forAustralian citizenship.

If you become an Australian citizen, you don't require a visa to enter Australia. You will need to apply for an Australian passport and use it to leave and re-enter Australia. See more about eligibility requirements and current processing times for
Australian citizenship
.

### What this visa lets you do

What this visa lets you do
Details

This visa allows you and your dependent family members who also hold a subclass 890 visa to:

This visa allows you and your dependent family members who also hold a subclass 890 visa to:
- stay in Australia permanently
stay in Australia permanently
- work and study in Australia
work and study in Australia
- carry out business activity in Australia
carry out business activity in Australia
- enrol in Australia’s public health care scheme,Medicare
enrol in Australia’s public health care scheme,
Medicare
- sponsor your relatives to come to Australia
sponsor your relatives to come to Australia
- travel to and from Australia for 5 years
travel to and from Australia for 5 years
- apply for Australian citizenship, if eligible.
apply for Australian citizenship, if eligible.

### Your obligations

Your obligations
Details

You and your family members must meet all visa conditions and obey Australian laws.

You and your family members must meet all visa conditions and obey Australian laws.

### Tell us if things change

Tell us if things change
Details

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:
- changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
- changes to your relationship status
changes to your relationship status
- the birth of a child.
the birth of a child.

See how to let us know if there is achange in your situation.

See how to let us know if there is a
change in your situation
.

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.
